nodes.description: 卡扎伊总统从华盛顿返回并与奥巴马会面，讨论坎大哈攻势
nodes.support_text: where he had met with President Obama and other senior American officials. Among the topics discussed in Washington was the Kandahar offensive

nodes.description: 8 a.m.，袭击者在喀布尔 Dar-ul-Aman Road美军车队中引爆炸弹
nodes.support_text: The bomber struck at 8 a.m., when the streets were filled with traffic. The American convoy... moving down Dar-ul-Aman Road

nodes.description: 袭击成为喀布尔近几周最严重的一次
nodes.support_text: It was the worst attack in Kabul in weeks

nodes.description: 塔利班宣称杀死美军和北约士兵但未提及平民伤亡
nodes.support_text: The Taliban were quick to congratulate themselves for killing the American and NATO soldiers, their statement made no mention of the dead and wounded Afghan civilians

nodes.description: 联合国、北约和美国使馆谴责塔利班
nodes.support_text: The attack was condemned by the United Nations, NATO and the American Embassy

edges.support_text: when Nizamuddin... Tuesday morning, when President Hamid Karzai was preparing to meet... hours after his return from Washington
It was the worst attack in Kabul in weeks
The Taliban were quick to congratulate themselves for killing the American and NATO soldiers
The attack was condemned by the United Nations, NATO and the American Embassy
